alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Crazy Mountains; Judith Gap; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 04 at 3:50PM MDT until April 06 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph occurring. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT Tuesday Night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...During periods of snow, blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. 4 to 8 inches of snow accumulation is expected in the Beartooth and Crazy mountains. This snow combined with the strong winds will create near whiteout conditions at times, making back country activities and travel dangerous.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris, tree limbs, and downed power lines. Use caution if you must drive. Secure loose objects on your property to avoid damage. Ranchers should take precautions to protect young livestock. Don`t cause a spark!
